headline: HCA Healthcare Names Virginia Tenpenny Vice President of Community Engagement
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., December 09, 2025--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that Virginia Tenpenny has been named vice president of community engagement, effective January 12, 2026.
